title: Cloudflare refuses to pull out of Russia, says Putin would celebrate shutoff | Ars Technica
description: Cloudflare: "We believe the Russian government would celebrate us shutting down."

title: At long last: Apple will sell a desktop monitor that doesn’t cost $5,000 | Ars Technica
description: The new monitor will support 5K and house an A13 Bionic chip.

title: VW unveils adorable electric ID. Buzz, US sales begin in 2024 | Ars Technica
description: The three-row-long wheelbase version for North America is still two years away.
